lead_paragraph: A woman and her daughter are both listed in stable condition after they were robbed outside a hotel near the airport, the police said.

headline.print_headline: 2 Women Hurt During Robbery at Airport Hotel
headline.main: 2 Women Hurt in Robbery at Hotel Near J.F.K. Airport

snippet: A woman and her daughter are both listed in stable condition after they were robbed outside a hotel near the airport, the police said.
abstract: Woman is shot and her daughter is injured during robbery outside hotel near Kennedy International Airport in Queens.
